actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 96-416.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 for the purpose of enhancing the development of geothermal resources situated beneath Federal lands.

summary.text: Amends the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 to increase to 51,200 acres the acreage limitations for geothermal leases on Federal lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 for the purpose of enhancing the development of geothermal resources situated beneath Federal lands.
